title: Tracks.Ahead.1of2.Great.Train.Journeys.HDrip.720p.x264.AAC.MVGro
description:
Tracks Ahead: Great Train Journeys

Travel Documentary hosted by Spencer Christian, published by Janson Media in 2001 - English narration
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/f/f7/Tracks-Ahead-Great-Train-Journeys-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Tracks Ahead: Great Train Journeys 
Filmed in High-Definition! Tracks Ahead is a favorite among train enthusiasts because it gives rail fanatics a chance to visit exotic rail destinations. TRACKS AHEAD presents the best of steam locomotives, railroad stories, model trains, scenic rail journeys and art. It also appeals to the staunch "railheads" as the program also features the technical aspect of trains and layouts.


1)  Great Train Journeys: Main Show 
Experience twelve of the greatest train journeys of the world on this DVD from the producers of the award-winning public television series Tracks Ahead.
Australia's Barossa Wine Train
The Great South Pacific Orient Express of Australia
The Conway Scenic Railroad of New Hampshire
San Francisco's Cable Cars
Mexico's Copper Canyon
The Ghan Railway of Australia
The Trains of Cuba
Trains of New Zealand
Australia's Puffing Billy
Australia's Indian Pacific Railroad
New Zealand's Taieri Gorge Railway
A Ride on the Zephyr from Chicago to the Rocky Mountains with Henry Kisor

2)  Great Train Journeys: Extras 
Extra features on this DVD include a profile of artist John Bromley, and visits to the Baltimore Railroad Club, Idaho's Silverwood Central Railway, the Kentucky Railroad Museum, the St. Louis Car Company.
